meaningMnemonic: You're free to <kanji>choose</kanji> and <kanji>select</kanji> any of these <kanji>limb</kanji>s, leaving you many <vocabulary>choices</vocabulary>. With all these <vocabulary>options</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>alternatives</vocabulary>, which one will you go for?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
